org.jmesa.model
Class TableModelUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.jmesa.model.TableModelUtils

public class TableModelUtils
extends Object

A series of utilities that complements the TableModel object. Especially useful for developers that use the tag library and use features like the Worksheet and Limit.

Since:
3.0
Author:
Jeff Johnston
